Index.basicSubscriptionPlanDescription: With the Starter Plan you will have access to the complete smart menu service.
Index.customSubscriptionPlanDescription: With the Main Course Plan you will have access to the premium smart menu service.
Index.customOneSubscriptionPlanDescription: With the Chef's Recommendation you will have your own smart menu with all the benefits of the Main Course plan, but with the difference that this menu will be created from scratch for you, with 100% customization.
Index.premiumAndCustom: Perfect if you want premium custom development.
